items.text: Welcome to Gaze Questionnaire!

Answer multiple Question-Types with Blink, Dwell or Smooth Pursuit.
This is a Demo Questionnaire. Enjoy! ðŸ™‚

BLOCK I:
Dwell Time Selection
Dwell 1-2 Seconds on a target to select

Are you wearing Glasses right now? 
(yes/no)
